alert.note: Alert for Haskell; Latimer; Le Flore; Muskogee; Pittsburg; Pushmataha; Sequoyah (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 7:13AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Pushmataha, Haskell, central Sequoyah, Latimer, northwestern Le Flore, eastern Pittsburg and southeastern Muskogee Counties through 800 AM CDT... At 713 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles north of Porum to near Daisy. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Sallisaw... Wilburton... Stigler... Clayton... Muldrow... Hartshorne... Vian... Talihina... Quinton... Porum... Webbers Falls... Keota... Red Oak... Mccurtain... Bokoshe... Fanshawe... Whitefield... Gans... Kinta... Tamaha... This includes Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 278 and 316. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.

area.areaDesc: Haskell; Latimer; Le Flore; Muskogee; Pittsburg; Pushmataha; Sequoyah
